featured.text: C. Cathy Zoos are a tradition, and a visit to a zoo is a wholesome family activity.
A. Amy Personally I’m against zoos, though I do understand some of the arguments why they should exist.

F. Frank Well, if zoos are an inevitability, zoo keepers must provide the best possible conditions for the animals that live in captivity—to say the least! G. George Zoos have an educational aspect to it.

definition.zh_def: 動物園：一個展示各種動物的地方，通常供公眾參觀和教育。
definition.en_def: Zoos: Places where various animals are kept for public viewing and education.
definition.example: The children were excited to see the lions and tigers at the zoo.
